messages.content:
If you don’t know why you’re here, check out the Feral File website. https://feralfile.com/

It’s pretty easy for everyone to enjoy digital art together. If you just want to share your work https://discord.com/channels/768706944097058828/1058442237014446181, let off some steam, introduce yourself, please do so in #💬┃welcome.

Please:
> **DON’T** be a jerk.

> **DON’T** be scammed. Avoid DM’ing (private messaging) others here about private transactions. If you need technical support, see our Contact page https://feralfile.com/docs/contact. No one from Feral File will ever ask for crypto, your private keys. When in doubt, ask publicly.

📌 **A reminder for common questions:**

• Feral File artworks are minted on Tezos or Ethereum; blockchain choice is made by the curators and artists at the exhibition level. Similarly, you can collect Feral File on secondary markets such as Objkt https://objkt.com/explore/collections/1?search=feralfile&sort=volume_total:desc and OpenSea https://opensea.io/FeralFile?tab=created.

• We accept credit cards and crypto. While pricing is set in $ USD, you may pay in crypto directly from your web3 wallet for the applicable blockchain.

• Enjoy your Feral File collection with our Autonomy digital art wallet on iOS https://apps.apple.com/us/app/autonomy-app/id1544022728 and Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bitmark.autonomy_client&hl=en_US&gl=US. It gives you one easy-to-use app to securely collect, view and discover digital art you love. It supports Tezos and Ethereum NFTs.

• Receive first knowledge of upcoming exhibitions and improvements to the collector experience through our newsletter https://us14.campaign-archive.com/home/?u=6ba47d35944fc04102b0e9ae6&id=534ea3fa0f.

• Our mission is to build a sustainable curated ecosystem for digital art, driven by the long-term interests of our artists, curators, and collectors. Learn more here https://feralfile.com/docs/sustainability.
